attributes.additional_details: Succesive goverments have spent far more than they have raised in taxation from the British public continually spending more and borrowing money to spend on projects, to give to other countries and making reckless decsions regarding OUR money. Goverments should be forced to be more transparent as David Cameron has promised and I propose that each goverment should have to publish an independant  detailed set of accounts showing how much tax has been raised, in what manner and how it has been spent/ allocated and what future commitments they have committed the British taxpayer to 6 months prior to re-election. The British public will then have the correct information needed on how to debate any anomolies/issues and vote accordingly.
